fields.name: NEBNext® Ultra™ II DNA Library Prep Kit for Illumina
fields.explanation: enzymes and buffers ideal to convert a small amount of DNA input into indexed libraries

fields.name: NEBNext® Ultra™ DNA Library Prep Kit for Illumina
fields.explanation: enzymes and buffersto to convert a small amount of DNA input into indexed libraries
fields.comments: previous version of NEB Ultra II (E7645), less sensitive

fields.name: TruSeq® DNA PCR-Free Sample Preparation
fields.explanation: covaris-assisted shearing of DNA to desired fragment size, ligation of indexed adaptors, no PCR
fields.input_requirements: 1 µg high molecular weight genomic DANN

fields.name: Nextera® DNA Sample Preparation
fields.explanation: fragmentation and adaptor ligation in a single step (tagmentation), PCR to provide single- or dual-indexed libraries
fields.input_requirements: 50 ng high molecular weight genomic DNA
fields.comments: can be used for: large/complex Genome sequencing

fields.name: Nextera® XT DNA Sample Preparation
fields.explanation: fragmentation and adaptor ligation in a single step (tagmentation), PCR to provide single- or dual-indexed libraries
fields.comments: can be used for: small Genome, Amplicons, Plasmide, ds-cDNA sequencing

fields.name: TruSeq® DNA Methylation Kit
fields.explanation: bisulfite conversion of input DNA, prep of indexed libraries
fields.input_requirements: 50-100 ng high molecular weight genomic DNA

fields.name: Custom protocol for amplicon preparation
fields.explanation: Amplicons provided by user, PCR is done by facility to produce indexed sequencing libraries

fields.name: TruSeq® Stranded mRNA
fields.explanation: mRNA enrichment with poly-T oligo attached magnetic beads, cDNA prep (random priming, dUTP incorporation for strand specificity), indexed library preparation
fields.comments: previously isolated mRNA can also serve as starting material

fields.name: TruSeq® Stranded Total RNA (Gold)
fields.explanation: removal of rRNA using biotinylated, target-specific oligos combined with magnetic Ribo-Zero rRNA removal beads. Gold: depletion of both cytoplasmic and mitochondrial rRNA, cDNA prep (random priming, dUTP incorporation for strand specificity), indexed
fields.comments: Oligos designed to target Mouse/Rat/Human, can be used for other organisms drosophila/zebrafish

fields.name: SMART-Seq v4 Ultra Low Input RNA
fields.explanation: double-stranded full length cDNA preparation (dT-priming), Conversion of cDNA into indexed libraries using i.e. Nextera DNA library preparation

fields.name: TruSeq® Small RNA Sample Prep
fields.explanation: ligation of adapters to small RNA molecules, first strand cDNA synthesis, PCR enrichment for indexed library preparation, purification with polyacryamid gelelectrophoresis

fields.name: NEBNext® Ultra™RNA Library Prep (mRNA)
fields.explanation: mRNA enrichment with poly-T oligo attached magnetic beads, cDNA prep (random priming), indexed library prep
fields.comments: alternative to TruSeq stranded mRNA, lower RNA input, no strand specificity

fields.name: NEBNext® Ultra™RNA Library Prep (total RNA)
fields.explanation: removal of rRNA using target-specific oligos combined with RNaseH and DNaseI digestion, cDNA prep (random priming), indexed library prep
fields.comments: alternative to TruSeq stranded total RNA kit, alternate rRNA removal technology, no strand specificity
